text:
What time of the year is it better to buy suburban real estate
07 Nov 2019, 07:00 by Natalya Kopylova
Choose the right season to save and how to study the features of the house.
Pros and cons of the seasons
Winter
The season of outdoor recreation is over, and the spoiled weather discourages all the desire to leave the city. And this applies not only to those who are looking for a cottage. The search for a cottage or townhouse is also postponed until spring. And in vain.
In the winter months, the demand for suburban real estate decreases, and with it prices fall.
The faster the owner needs to sell the house, the more he is inclined to bargain. So you can save dozens, or even hundreds of thousands of rubles. However, you need to be prepared for the fact that the choice will not be as large as in summer and spring.
In winter, it is easy to find out if there are leaks and design flaws. So, if there is frost on the walls, it means that the building has problems with thermal insulation. And puddles on the windowsills and damp spots on the ceiling signal insufficient waterproofing.
You can also evaluate whether the roads in the village are being cleaned. It happens that light snow paralyzes life for several days. If you are going to come to a country house in winter or live in it all year round, this is an extremely significant factor. At the same time, it‚Äôs worth checking how quickly you can get to important destinations. Is the store close, how long does it take to get to school, hospital, work. In summer, you can spend a few minutes on the road, and hours in the slush and snow.
It is important how much the village is populated in the winter and, if not, how it is protected.
If for half a year all nearby houses are empty and no safety measures are taken, you run the risk of finding smoldering, ruin and traces of the life of uninvited residents every spring in your area.
If you buy a house in winter, you must be prepared for the fact that external repairs will have to be postponed until spring. But with a cosmetic repair just in time for the season. In addition, there is a danger of missing the site. Under the snow it will be hard to see potholes and ravines.
Spring
This is the peak period for the sale of suburban real estate. Everyone who postponed the acquisition in the winter, in the spring begin to look for a cottage or cottage. Moreover, many buyers are determined to spend the summer already on the new site. And it will not be difficult to find him: there are a lot of offers. Of course, such activity is reflected in the price: it will be high.
The main advantage of spring shopping is the opportunity to assess how water leaves the site. If deep puddles stand until June, and the soil is swampy, it is clearly worth looking for more. This is also a great time to find out if roads become sour and how quickly they dry. If you dreamed about a garden, then by the type and number of plants it will be possible to assess the fertility of the soil and the efforts that need to be made to grow a rich crop on it.
In the season, it is easier to get to know your nearest neighbors and find out whether it will be comfortable for you to be near. If they love noisy parties from Friday evening to Monday morning, abuse alcohol and are prone to aggression, you can hardly manage to live in peace. Here a three-meter fence will not save. So it‚Äôs better to clarify this issue in advance.
Summer
Summer retains the benefits of spring and adds new ones. For example, it is easy to find out not only the whole truth about neighbors, but also about other residents of the village. It's about insects and other animals. In nature, there is no escape from bugs and spiders, but in everything you need a measure. If in the evening a swarm of mosquitoes is circling around the house, and strawberries are not visible due to slugs, the priority for the coming months, or even years, will be a war with them. If you do not need this, it is better to look for real estate in the insect season.
Landlord owners typically lure buyers with promises of fruit trees and shrubs. But in winter it‚Äôs just bare branches - it‚Äôs hard to understand what will grow on them. In spring, you can estimate the number of flowers and ovaries, in summer and autumn - the harvest. It will be difficult to make a mistake.
Autumn
This period is similar to spring with rare exceptions. The yield of trees and shrubs is easier to evaluate, since they will not have flowers, but finished fruits. And the price of real estate at this time is already reduced. At the beginning of the summer season, sellers are not afraid to set high prices, they still have a whole summer for sale. If the object did not leave by autumn, this is an occasion to reduce appetites.
When to buy suburban real estate
It is worth determining priorities and choosing a season depending on what is important to you in a country house. If you select an expensive object, it is worth approaching the issue as seriously as possible.



We recommend that our customers first rent a house in the place where they want to buy real estate, and live exactly one year to experience all the pros and cons of country life in each season of the year. Self-cleaning snow and leaves on the site, caring for the technical equipment of the house, the road to work, school, kindergarten, a medical institution and other necessary infrastructure - all this is very important. Yekaterina Andreeva, Director General, Real Estate and Insurance Agency Krieger
Another option is to start picking up a house in the summer to buy it in late autumn. In this case, you can feel the benefits of each season (as a rule, at the end of autumn it is already quite cold and snowy).
